plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow outside.
⚽ You can play on me.
🐄 Animals like to eat me.

plant.question: I have a trunk and leaves, and birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: ⬆ I am very tall.
🍂 My leaves fall in autumn.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.

plant.question: I am colorful and smell sweet. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I grow in a garden.
💐 People give me as gifts.
🐝 Bees get nectar from me.

plant.question: I am long and orange, and rabbits like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow underground.
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves me.
👀 I help you see better.

plant.question: I am red and round, and I grow on a vine. You can make sauce with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I am a fruit but people think I am a vegetable.
🍕 I am used to make pizza sauce
☀️ I grow best in warm weather.

plant.question: I am tall and have prickly needles instead of leaves. Many people decorate me for Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I stay green all year.
🌟 I am decorated with lights.
🎁 Presents are placed under me.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when heated. People like to eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I start as a kernel.
🍿 I am fluffy and white when cooked.
🎬 You eat me watching movies.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow in warm places.
🥥 I have sweet water inside.
🐒 Monkeys try hard to open me.

plant.question: I'm a green vegetable that looks like a tiny tree. People say I'm good for you. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I have little green 'trees' on top.
🥗 I am often eaten steamed or raw.
💪 I am full of vitamins.

plant.question: I'm a tall, strong plant that gives us wood to build houses. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I have a very thick trunk.
🏠 My wood is used to build homes.
🪓 People use axes to cut me down.

food.question: I am yellow, and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 A furry animal enjoys eating me.
💛 I'm a popular fruit that grows in bunches.
🍴 You need to peel me to eat me.

food.question: I am white and good with cookies. Cows make me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am a drink that is white
🐄 Calves need me from their mothers.
🍪 I am a popular drink to have with sweet baked goods.

food.question: I am long, orange, and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a popular snack for bunnies.
🌱 I grow underground.
🐰 I am a vegetable that is orange.

food.question: I am round and red. I grow on trees. Doctors say I'm good for you! What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I come in lots of different colors, not just red.
🌳 I need sunshine and water to grow.
🩺 An old saying is 'one a day keeps the doctor away!'

food.question: I am a treat that is cold, sweet, and comes in many flavors. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 You can eat me in a cone or a cup.
🥶 I'm often stored in a freezer.
👅 Many people love me on a hot summer day!

food.question: I am made of dough, covered in sauce and cheese, and baked in an oven. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 I can be cut into slices.
🔥 You need heat to cook me!
🍅 Often, I have tomato as the base!

food.question: I'm a small, green vegetable that looks like a tiny tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I am good for you!
🌍 My florets sometimes look like small forests.
💚 I am a green vegetable that kids sometimes don't like.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin and a juicy green inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 Birds and bears love to eat me!
🟤 My skin is brown.
🥄 You may need a spoon to enjoy me!

food.question: I am made from wheat, baked in an oven, and often eaten with butter. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 People often use me to make sandwiches.
🌾 I am often golden brown.
🧈 I go well with butter and jam.

food.question: I am a yellow spread made from seeds and often put on sandwiches. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 The seeds come from tall yellow flowers.
🥪 I am very popular in the US.
💜 I'm often paired with jelly.
